name: Quest for Camelot: Dragon Games
summary: Quest For Camelot Dragon Games is a video game published in 1998 on Windows by Knowledge Adventure, Inc., Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment Inc.. It's an action and strategy game, set in a licensed title, mini-games and medieval themes, and was also released on Mac.
